text.en: Throughout these lands and everywhere upon the earth in general,
text.en-trans: dzamling chi dang yul kham didak tu

text.en: May the sufferings of disease, famine and warfare be entirely unknown, so that not even their names occur.
text.en-trans: né muk tsön sok dukngal ming mi drak

text.en: May observance of the Dharma, merit and prosperity increase,
text.en-trans: chöden sönam paljor gong du pel

text.en: And may there always be good fortune and well-being in abundance.
